name: Popl
headline: AI-powered Lead capture & digital business cards for teams
description: Popl is the leading digital business card platform for teams and individuals. Professionals use our software platforms and smart devices to make instant digital connections with potential clients.

founders.name: Jason Alvarez-Cohen, Founder
founders.description:
CEO & Co-founder @ Popl

UCLA class of 2018, software engineer obsessed with tech that connects people

# Connecting you with your future customers
Conferences are chaotic, lead capture shouldnâ€™t be
Popl is the only AI-powered event lead capture + digital business card platform designed to help teams maximize every conference, expo, and trade show.
Popl is the only AI-powered event lead capture + digital business card platform built to help teams maximize every event.
[ Get Started Now ](https://popl.co/<#individual-or-team>)
## 60% of Fortune 500 companies trust Popl for lead capture

AI-powered lead capture
### Scan anything into your CRM
Scan conference badges, business cards, LinkedIn QR codes, and more - instantly qualify, enrich, and sync.
Let Popl AI enrichment fill in all missing contact info so your team never has to.
[ See Popl in Action ](https://popl.co/<#individual-or-team>)
## One platform, every event
EventCampaigns
Be prepared for every event - set up lead qualifiers, required fields, auto tagging, unique CRM integrations, and more.
AI-PoweredConference Prospecting
Enrich exhibitor lists, identify your key prospects and existing customers, and set your team up for success.
MarketingAttribution
Relax knowing that every lead, meeting, and touchpoint is being accurately attributed.
AI-PoweredUniversal Scanning
Scan, enrich, and sync everything to your CRM in real-time so you can take action and follow up instantly.
Calendar BookingIntegration
Schedule more meetings at events (without the chaos) by connecting your existing calendar booking software.
LeadQualifiers
Customize qualifying questions to capture details such as buyer info, product interest, lead scoring, and more.
Automatic CRM Syncing
Ensure 100% of leads instantly sync to your CRM upon capture, eliminating all manual data entry for your team.
Post-EventFollow Up
Speed to lead is everything - follow up right at the booth while you're still top of mind, not hours later.
Event Sourceof Truth
Let Popl keep track of all data points, activities, leads, meetings, notes, and more. Become an event attribution wizard.
Before Your Event
During Your Event
After Your Event
![](https://popl.co/cdn/shop/files/Compressed_Image.png?v=1738291241&width=880)
THE INDUSTRY LEADER
More than just digital business cards
You're on a mission to go digital. Equip your team with stunning digital business cards that also capture leadsâ€”delivering seamless connections while providing brand consistency and exceeding sustainability goals.
[Learn More](https://popl.co/<#individual-or-team>)
![](https://popl.co/cdn/shop/files/Image_6-2x-scanner.png?v=1738209073&width=880)
OFFLINE SCANNING
No internet, no problem
Let's face it, conference Wi-Fi can be a nightmare. We built Popl from the ground up with offline capabilities in mind so that all leads are saved, enriched, and synced no matter the conditions.
[See Popl in Action](https://popl.co/<#individual-or-team>)
![](https://popl.co/cdn/shop/files/iStock-1460124878.png?v=1738117502&width=880)
CALL US ANYTIME
On-Floor Event Support
We know that things don't always go according to plan, especially on the event floor. That's why we pride ourselves on being the only event solution that provides on-floor call support at all times. With us, you're never alone on the conference floor.
[Chat With Support](https://popl.co/<#chatSupport>)
![](https://popl.co/cdn/shop/files/Stocksy_txp962e97bd384400_Medium_5867998.jpg?v=1736346219&width=880)
Yes, it works at every event
Don't believe it? Search your event
Popl provides universal lead capture, giving your team a unified, intuitive platform for in-person lead capture wherever they go.
![](https://popl.co/cdn/shop/files/Frame_316125432.svg?v=1736955638&width=1260)

## Frequently Asked Questions
[See All FAQs](https://popl.co/<https:/support.popl.co>)
How does Popl simplify lead capture at events?
Popl enables instant lead capture, qualification, and CRM syncingâ€”ensuring no manual data entry is required by any team member.
Does Popl really work at every event?
Yes. Popl is designed to work at any event, from small networking meetups to large trade shows and conferences. Our universal lead capture technology works independently from event organizers, meaning your team can scan badges, collect contacts, and sync leads to your CRMâ€”regardless of the eventâ€™s lead systems.
How fast can my team start using Popl?
Popl Teams is designed for fast onboarding, with most teams set up and running the same day, thanks to its user-friendly interface and seamless integrations.
Can I try Popl for free?
Yes, Popl offers free trials and personalized demos. Free trials are designed for individuals to explore and experience the benefits of Popl Teams before committing to setting up a team.
How does pricing work for Popl?
Popl offers flexible pricing for both teams and individuals. Contact us for a custom quote or explore our available plans.
See all pricing here: [https://popl.co/pages/pricing](https://popl.co/<https:/popl.co/pages/pricing> "https://popl.co/pages/pricing")
How does Popl's universal lead scanner work?
Poplâ€™s universal lead scanner first uses AI-powered OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology to scan event badges, paper business cards, and QR codes, extracting contact details in real-time.
Once our OCR vision technology identifies the information in an image, our proprietary Popl AI enrichment system and trained LLMs enrich the lead into a full contact.
With an industry-leading 90% enrichment success rate, Popl AI eliminates the need for reliance on conference lead capture badge kit APIs, giving customers a seamless and superior solution.
How does Popl AI enrichment work?
Popl AI captures a contact's name and company, then leverages our proprietary AI algorithms and intelligent search methods to gather the rest of their contact details.
Our enrichment process achieves a 90% successful email or LinkedIn profile match rateâ€”significantly above the industry standard.
Beyond providing personal contact details, our enrichment goes further, providing valuable insights into a contact's company as well
Does Popl require an event badge API kit to scan badges?
No! Unlike traditional lead retrieval systems, Poplâ€™s universal lead scanner works without expensive event badge API kits, saving your team thousands of dollars per event. However, we do offer event badge API integrations for most events.
Will Popl work when my phone is offline or my internet is bad?
Yes! Popl captures and stores leads offline, automatically syncing them once your device is back online.
We built Popl from the ground up with offline capabilities in mind so that all leads are saved, enriched, and synced no matter the conditions.
Can the Popl app scan QR codes to create leads?
Yes! Popl allows users to scan QR codes (including LinkedIn QR codes) to instantly capture lead information, ensuring fast and seamless contact collection at events, conferences, and meetings. You can also scan the QR codes of other digital business cards and save them as leads in Popl.
Can the Popl app scan other digital business cards?
Yep! The Popl app is the only app on the market that is able to scan other, non-Popl digital business cards from different companies.
The ability to scan other digital business cards is part of our universal lead scanner, which can scan virtually anything and capture it as a lead.
What mobile devices are compatible with the Popl app?
Popl works on all iOS (Apple) and Android devices, ensuring seamless functionality across smartphones and tablets so your team can capture and manage leads effortlessly.
Does Popl support multiple languages?
Yes, Popl offers support for any and all languages, allowing digital business cards to be used seamlessly across any region.
This ensures clear and localized connections, no matter where your team operates.
What type of customer support does Popl provide?
For quick support at any time, use the live chat on our website or email us at support@popl.co. You can also visit our [help center](https://popl.co/<https:/support.popl.co/en/>) for quick answers to any question!
If youâ€™re at an event, call our on-floor support team at 510-650-1841 for real-time assistance.
What integrations does Popl offer for CRMs, MAPs, and other sales tools?
Popl integrates with top CRMs like Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, Monday.com, VinSolutions, as well as leading Marketing Automation Platforms (MAPs) like Marketo, Pardot, and Eloqua.
With industry leading in-house integrations with features like unlimited custom mappings, auto-tagging, and de-duplication, Popl ensures seamless lead management across your sales and marketing stack.
Can Popl manage large organizations and multiple departments?
Yes! Popl supports subteams, department-specific branding, separate cost centers, and permission controls to ensure scalability and full customization.
Global admins in Popl can even assign subteam (group) admins and delegate management to others.
How does Popl ensure my teamâ€™s data stays secure?
Popl provides enterprise-grade security with SOC 2 Type 2 compliance, encrypted data storage, access management, and compliance with GDPR and other global standards.
What happens to digital business cards when a team member leaves?
Popl allows instant reassignment or deactivation of digital business cards. With our native HR integrations, team members are automatically removed when theyâ€™re removed from your HR database, saving you time.
Does Popl integrate with HR platforms for automated user management?
Yes! Popl integrates with leading HR platforms like Microsoft Azure Active Directory, Google Workspace, and Workday to automate on-boarding and off-boarding, ensuring seamless access management without manual updates.
Why is Popl the best digital business card?
Popl is the best digital business card solution, trusted by thousands of professionals and top-rated on platforms like G2, Capterra, and the App Store. With features like CRM integrations and 2-way lead collection, Popl makes in-person events seamless by helping you capture more leads effortlessly and maximize your lead generation. Other reasons include:
- Universal lead scanner
- Team management dashboard
- #1 rated mobile app with 100,000+ reviews
- 5000+ CRM integrations
- SOC 2 + GDPR level security and compliance
- 24/7 customer service
What is a digital business card and why should I use one?
A digital business card is a modern, eco-friendly alternative to traditional paper business cards. Itâ€™s an electronic format of a business card that you can share instantly via email, text, social media, NFC technology, or QR codes.
Digital business cards typically include the same details as paper cards, such as your name, job title, and contact information, but they go further by allowing multimedia elements like images, videos, and links to websites.
Switching to digital makes networking more seamless, reduces waste, and ensures your contact details are always up-to-date.
Does the person Iâ€™m meeting need an app to receive my digital business card?
No app needed! Your Popl digital business card opens in the recipientâ€™s browser, meaning anyone with a smartphone can access your contact information instantly.
Does Popl require a subscription to use?
Popl offers a free plan for individuals looking for a simple solution to share their digital business card. For individuals and teams looking to capture and manage leads, Popl offers flexible subscription pricing tailored to your teamâ€™s size and feature needs. Contact us for a custom quote or explore our available plans.
For individuals, we also offer Popl Pro and Popl Pro+ plans, which provides advanced digital business card features without requiring a team setup.
See all pricing here:[ https://popl.co/pages/pricing](https://popl.co/<https:/popl.co/pages/pricing> "https://popl.co/pages/pricing")
How does a digital business card work?
A digital business card stores your contact information in an electronic format thatâ€™s easy to share and access on smartphones and other devices.
You can create your card using an app or platform like Popl, where you input details, customize the design, and add multimedia content. Once created, you can share it through email, text, social media, or QR code.
Recipients can save your details directly to their contacts or CRM without needing to manually type anything. This saves time, reduces errors, and makes networking more efficient.
What are the benefits of using digital business cards?
Digital business cards provide a range of benefits that make them the ideal choice for professionals and businesses:
  * Eco-friendly: They eliminate the need for paper and printing, making them a sustainable option.
  * Customizable: Add multimedia content like website links, social media profiles, images, and videos to enhance your personal brand.
  * Improved online visibility: Shareable online, making it easier for potential customers or connections to find and engage with you.
  * Cost-effective: No reprinting requiredâ€”just update your information as needed.


By switching to digital, you save resources, stand out professionally, and create a stronger online presence.
What are digital business cards, and how are they different from traditional business cards?
Digital business cards are a more advanced and sustainable alternative to traditional paper cards.
With digital cards, you can include multimedia elements like social media links, videos, and website URLs to give a complete picture of your brand or business. Theyâ€™re also easier to share, update, and store.
Unlike paper cards, which are often discarded and cannot be updated without reprinting, digital business cards make a lasting impression while reducing waste.
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5315/7735/files/Gradient_Frame.png?v=1736788815)

## Frequently Asked Questions
See All FAQsâŸ¨13âŸ©
How does Popl simplify lead capture at events?
Popl enables instant lead capture, qualification, and CRM syncingâ€”ensuring no manual data entry is required by any team member.
Does Popl really work at every event?
Yes. Popl is designed to work at any event, from small networking meetups to large trade shows and conferences. Our universal lead capture technology works independently from event organizers, meaning your team can scan badges, collect contacts, and sync leads to your CRMâ€”regardless of the eventâ€™s lead systems.
How fast can my team start using Popl?
Popl Teams is designed for fast onboarding, with most teams set up and running the same day, thanks to its user-friendly interface and seamless integrations.
Can I try Popl for free?
Yes, Popl offers free trials and personalized demos. Free trials are designed for individuals to explore and experience the benefits of Popl Teams before committing to setting up a team.
How does pricing work for Popl?
Popl offers flexible pricing for both teams and individuals. Contact us for a custom quote or explore our available plans.
See all pricing here: https://popl.co/pages/pricingâŸ¨14âŸ©
How does Popl's universal lead scanner work?
Poplâ€™s universal lead scanner first uses AI-powered OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology to scan event badges, paper business cards, and QR codes, extracting contact details in real-time.
Once our OCR vision technology identifies the information in an image, our proprietary Popl AI enrichment system and trained LLMs enrich the lead into a full contact.
With an industry-leading 90% enrichment success rate, Popl AI eliminates the need for reliance on conference lead capture badge kit APIs, giving customers a seamless and superior solution.
How does Popl AI enrichment work?
Popl AI captures a contact's name and company, then leverages our proprietary AI algorithms and intelligent search methods to gather the rest of their contact details.
Our enrichment process achieves a 90% successful email or LinkedIn profile match rateâ€”significantly above the industry standard.
Beyond providing personal contact details, our enrichment goes further, providing valuable insights into a contact's company as well
Does Popl require an event badge API kit to scan badges?
No! Unlike traditional lead retrieval systems, Poplâ€™s universal lead scanner works without expensive event badge API kits, saving your team thousands of dollars per event. However, we do offer event badge API integrations for most events.
Will Popl work when my phone is offline or my internet is bad?
Yes! Popl captures and stores leads offline, automatically syncing them once your device is back online.
We built Popl from the ground up with offline capabilities in mind so that all leads are saved, enriched, and synced no matter the conditions.
Can the Popl app scan QR codes to create leads?
Yes! Popl allows users to scan QR codes (including LinkedIn QR codes) to instantly capture lead information, ensuring fast and seamless contact collection at events, conferences, and meetings. You can also scan the QR codes of other digital business cards and save them as leads in Popl.
Can the Popl app scan other digital business cards?
Yep! The Popl app is the only app on the market that is able to scan other, non-Popl digital business cards from different companies.
The ability to scan other digital business cards is part of our universal lead scanner, which can scan virtually anything and capture it as a lead.
What mobile devices are compatible with the Popl app?
Popl works on all iOS (Apple) and Android devices, ensuring seamless functionality across smartphones and tablets so your team can capture and manage leads effortlessly.
Does Popl support multiple languages?
Yes, Popl offers support for any and all languages, allowing digital business cards to be used seamlessly across any region.
This ensures clear and localized connections, no matter where your team operates.
What type of customer support does Popl provide?
For quick support at any time, use the live chat on our website or email us at support@popl.co. You can also visit our help centerâŸ¨15âŸ© for quick answers to any question!
If youâ€™re at an event, call our on-floor support team at 510-650-1841 for real-time assistance.
What integrations does Popl offer for CRMs, MAPs, and other sales tools?
Popl integrates with top CRMs like Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, Monday.com, VinSolutions, as well as leading Marketing Automation Platforms (MAPs) like Marketo, Pardot, and Eloqua.
With industry leading in-house integrations with features like unlimited custom mappings, auto-tagging, and de-duplication, Popl ensures seamless lead management across your sales and marketing stack.
Can Popl manage large organizations and multiple departments?
Yes! Popl supports subteams, department-specific branding, separate cost centers, and permission controls to ensure scalability and full customization.
Global admins in Popl can even assign subteam (group) admins and delegate management to others.
How does Popl ensure my teamâ€™s data stays secure?
Popl provides enterprise-grade security with SOC 2 Type 2 compliance, encrypted data storage, access management, and compliance with GDPR and other global standards.
What happens to digital business cards when a team member leaves?
Popl allows instant reassignment or deactivation of digital business cards. With our native HR integrations, team members are automatically removed when theyâ€™re removed from your HR database, saving you time.
Does Popl integrate with HR platforms for automated user management?
Yes! Popl integrates with leading HR platforms like Microsoft Azure Active Directory, Google Workspace, and Workday to automate on-boarding and off-boarding, ensuring seamless access management without manual updates.
Why is Popl the best digital business card?
Popl is the best digital business card solution, trusted by thousands of professionals and top-rated on platforms like G2, Capterra, and the App Store. With features like CRM integrations and 2-way lead collection, Popl makes in-person events seamless by helping you capture more leads effortlessly and maximize your lead generation. Other reasons include:
- Universal lead scanner
- Team management dashboard
- #1 rated mobile app with 100,000+ reviews
- 5000+ CRM integrations

- 24/7 customer service
What is a digital business card and why should I use one?
A digital business card is a modern, eco-friendly alternative to traditional paper business cards. Itâ€™s an electronic format of a business card that you can share instantly via email, text, social media, NFC technology, or QR codes.
Digital business cards typically include the same details as paper cards, such as your name, job title, and contact information, but they go further by allowing multimedia elements like images, videos, and links to websites.
Switching to digital makes networking more seamless, reduces waste, and ensures your contact details are always up-to-date.
Does the person Iâ€™m meeting need an app to receive my digital business card?
No app needed! Your Popl digital business card opens in the recipientâ€™s browser, meaning anyone with a smartphone can access your contact information instantly.
Does Popl require a subscription to use?
Popl offers a free plan for individuals looking for a simple solution to share their digital business card. For individuals and teams looking to capture and manage leads, Popl offers flexible subscription pricing tailored to your teamâ€™s size and feature needs. Contact us for a custom quote or explore our available plans.
For individuals, we also offer Popl Pro and Popl Pro+ plans, which provides advanced digital business card features without requiring a team setup.
See all pricing here: https://popl.co/pages/pricingâŸ¨14âŸ©
How does a digital business card work?
A digital business card stores your contact information in an electronic format thatâ€™s easy to share and access on smartphones and other devices.
You can create your card using an app or platform like Popl, where you input details, customize the design, and add multimedia content. Once created, you can share it through email, text, social media, or QR code.
Recipients can save your details directly to their contacts or CRM without needing to manually type anything. This saves time, reduces errors, and makes networking more efficient.
What are the benefits of using digital business cards?
Digital business cards provide a range of benefits that make them the ideal choice for professionals and businesses:
  * Eco-friendly: They eliminate the need for paper and printing, making them a sustainable option.
  * Customizable: Add multimedia content like website links, social media profiles, images, and videos to enhance your personal brand.
  * Improved online visibility: Shareable online, making it easier for potential customers or connections to find and engage with you.
  * Cost-effective: No reprinting requiredâ€”just update your information as needed.


By switching to digital, you save resources, stand out professionally, and create a stronger online presence.
What are digital business cards, and how are they different from traditional business cards?
Digital business cards are a more advanced and sustainable alternative to traditional paper cards.
With digital cards, you can include multimedia elements like social media links, videos, and website URLs to give a complete picture of your brand or business. Theyâ€™re also easier to share, update, and store.
Unlike paper cards, which are often discarded and cannot be updated without reprinting, digital business cards make a lasting impression while reducing waste.

**Popl: Digital Business Cards and AI-Powered Lead Capture**

Founded in 2020 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Winter 2021 batch, Popl has carved out a unique niche in the world of professional networking. Based in New York and supported by a 45-member team, Popl's mission is simple: to revolutionize lead capture and digital business cards for teams and individuals.

### What Is Popl?

At its core, Popl is about making connections more efficient. Traditional networking tools often leave much to be desired; itâ€™s chaotic and cumbersome. Popl streamlines this chaos with an AI-enabled platform that allows users to create stunning digital business cards and capture leads instantly at events. With Popl, you can effortlessly connect with potential clients, scan various sources like badges and business cards, and sync that information directly to your CRMâ€”without a hitch.

### Key Features

1. **Universal Lead Capture**: Whether itâ€™s scanning badges or QR codes, Popl allows teams to gather contact information seamlesslyâ€”working independently of event organizers.
   
2. **AI Enrichment**: Popl uses AI to fill in missing contact details, achieving a 90% enrichment success rate, so your team never has to worry about incomplete information.
   
3. **Offline Capabilities**: In the age of unreliable Wi-Fi at events, Popl shines with its ability to capture leads offline and sync them later.

4. **Integrated Support**: Popl provides on-floor support during events, ensuring that youâ€™re never left without assistance when issues arise.

5. **Team Management**: With features suited to teams, Popl enables collaborative lead management, making it ideal for larger organizations looking to enhance their networking capabilities.

### Who Uses Popl?

Popl is trusted by over 60% of Fortune 500 companies, which speaks volumes about its effectiveness and reliability. From large corporations like Disney and Google to agile startups, Poplâ€™s versatility has made it popular among various professionals seeking to optimize their networking strategies.

### Why Choose Popl?

The modern professional landscape demands tools that adapt to fast-paced environments, and Popl does just that. With features like real-time sync, customizable lead qualifiers, and the ability to integrate seamlessly with major CRM platforms (like Salesforce and HubSpot), Popl positions itself as more than just a digital business cardâ€”itâ€™s a comprehensive lead management ecosystem.

So if youâ€™re looking to enhance how you exchange information and follow up with potential clients, check out Popl at [popl.co](https://popl.co) and explore how it could transform your networking practice.
